thread.title: Suspects in R300 farm murder held
thread.title_full: Suspects in R300 farm murder held | News24

author: news24.com
title: Suspects in R300 farm murder held
text:
Pietermaritzburg - The men suspected of murdering Camperdown farmer Krishnadhaven Govender last month “for R300” have been arrested.
Last month the well-known farmer and family man was shot and killed by armed robbers when they broke into his house after an attempt to break into his neighbours’ property failed. Govender’s wife and sons watched in horror as he was gunned down in his Killarney Isles home while he tried to protect them.
A police source previously told The Witness that seven men entered the property after cutting through its electric fence. Once inside, the family was woken up and a struggle ensued, with gunshots being fired by both parties.
Govender died at the scene while the men, two of them with minor gunshot wounds, retreated from the house with R300 worth of items.
